dcterms:creator: S. Zhao
D. Zelazo
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on bearing-based formation stabilization with directed interaction topologies, providing insights into the control mechanisms for multi-agent systems.
dcterms:title: Bearing-based formation control

dcterms:creator: S. Zhao
D. Zelazo
dcterms:description: This dataset presents the bearing rigidity theory and its applications for control and estimation of network systems, emphasizing the importance of bearing measurements.
dcterms:title: Bearing rigidity theory

dcterms:creator: B.D.O. Anderson
C. Yu
B. Fidan
J.M. Hendrickx
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses rigid graph control architectures for autonomous formations, providing a framework for understanding multi-agent coordination.
dcterms:title: Rigid graph control architectures

dcterms:creator: Z. Lin
T. Han
R. Zheng
M. Fu
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses distributed localization for 2-D sensor networks using bearing-only measurements under switching topologies, highlighting the challenges in localization.
dcterms:title: Distributed localization for 2-D sensor networks

dcterms:creator: M.H. Trinh
S. Zhao
Z. Sun
D. Zelazo
B.D.O. Anderson
H.S. Ahn
dcterms:description: This dataset explores bearing-based formation control of a group of agents with a leader-first follower structure, focusing on the dynamics of multi-agent systems.
dcterms:title: Bearing-based formation control of a group of agents with leader-first follower structure

dcterms:creator: S. Zhao
D. Zelazo
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates bearing rigidity and almost global bearing-only formation stabilization, providing insights into stability conditions for formations.
dcterms:title: Bearing rigidity and almost global bearing-only formation stabilization

dcterms:creator: A. Karimian
R. Tron
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on bearing-only navigation with field of view constraints, addressing the challenges in navigation systems using bearing measurements.
dcterms:title: Bearing-only navigation with field of view constraints

dcterms:creator: Z. Tang
R. Cunha
T. Hamel
C. Silvestre
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses relaxed bearing rigidity and bearing formation control under persistence of excitation, providing insights into control strategies.
dcterms:title: Relaxed bearing rigidity and bearing formation control under persistence of excitation

dcterms:creator: Z. Tang
R. Cunha
T. Hamel
C. Silvestre
dcterms:description: This dataset explores formation control of a leader-follower structure in three-dimensional space using bearing measurements, focusing on 3D dynamics.
dcterms:title: Formation control of a leaderâ€“follower structure in three-dimensional space using bearing measurements

dcterms:creator: M. Mesbahi
M. Egerstedt
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a comprehensive overview of graph theoretic methods in multiagent networks, serving as a foundational reference for understanding network dynamics.
dcterms:title: Graph theoretic methods in multiagent networks
